about_the_game:
"I mean. Love is in the air, just take off your pants already."

Lora had a single reason to come to this damned City of light and dreams, really. She got her invitation to love — and then... nothing happened. Maybe they don't want her like that? Then what do they want exactly?

"So the biggest difference would be one less exhibit under the dusty glass."

Maya had a single reason to come to this damned City of light and dreams, really. Screw her past life. It never existed. It never happened. Why can't it just leave her be?!


The Monster takes place during the events of Lifesigns and focuses on things left untold in the main game. You can play it separately from the main menu or choose to explore the full story joined seamlessly (main game plus dlc) with the "New Game +" feature.

This DLC features:
  • new locations;
  • new characters;
  • addition to the amazing soundtrack;
  • some hints to other installments of the Mirror Universe.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may not be appropriate for some audiences. Game content includes nudity, explicitly described sex scenes (text only) and strong language.

short_description: Lora almost joins a cult, Maya has visions and Bianca meets a new friend. A series of events that fills in some blanks and answers questions that the main game left unanswered.
